job_history.work_description: Planning and Strategy, Leadership Development, Project Management, QA and Testing

projects.description: Designed and developed the process to collect and track $29M in IT-Sourcing Business Case Multi Year Savings
Designed and project managed the development, QA strategies and implementation of Portfolio Management Database application
Collaborated in the establishment of the QA Automation infrastructure through proof of concepts, benefits and impact analysis

skills.name: Project Management
skills.explanation: Has extensive experience in project management, having led multiple projects and teams, including the development of a Portfolio Management Database application and the establishment of a QA Automation infrastructure, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Leadership Development
skills.explanation: Has experience in leadership development, having worked as an Adjunct Instructor and led teams in various roles, suggesting strong proficiency.

skills.name: Software Development
skills.explanation: Has extensive experience in software development, having worked as a Software Developer and Software Developer/QA Project Lead, suggesting strong proficiency.

skills.name: QA and Testing
skills.explanation: Has extensive experience in QA and testing, having worked in various roles, including Software Developer and Software Developer/QA Project Lead, and having established a QA Automation infrastructure, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Database
skills.explanation: Has experience in database development, having worked on the Portfolio Management Database application, suggesting a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Business Case
skills.explanation: Has experience in business case development, having worked on the IT-Sourcing Business Case, suggesting a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Data Collection
skills.explanation: Has experience in data collection, having worked on the IT-Sourcing Business Case, suggesting a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: QA Automation
skills.explanation: Has experience in QA automation, having worked on the establishment of a QA Automation infrastructure, suggesting strong proficiency.

skills.name: Planning and Strategy
skills.explanation: Has experience in planning and strategy, having worked as an Adjunct Instructor, suggesting strong proficiency.
